title: AIIMS Raipur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 100 Senior Resident Posts
description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS Raipur) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 100 Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD/MS, DNB, Diploma, and Post-Graduation can grab this chance and apply for the AIIMS Raipur Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, and salary structure, education details, application fee, nd how to apply for these posts. If you are looking for more, here is a lis...
